name.de: Podcasts - Ein Podcast-Player, Downloader und Textkonvertierungstool
name.fr: Podcasts - Un lecteur, un téléchargeur, un transcripteur
name.it: Podcasts - Un riproduttore di podcast e un downloader
name.ja: Podcasts - ポッドキャストをテキストに転記できるポッドキャストプレーヤー
name.ko: Podcasts - 팟캐스트 플레이어, 다운로더, 텍스트 변환 도구
name.pt_PT: Podcasts - Um leitor, descarregador e transcritor
name.th: Podcasts - เครื่องมือดาวน์โหลดพอดแคสและแปลงเสียงพูดเป็นข้อความ
name.vi: Podcasts - Một trình phát, tải về, chuyển văn bản
name.zh_CN: 播客：一个播客播放器，下载器，文字转写工具
name.zh_TW: 播客：一個播客播放器，下載器，文字轉寫工具

short.ar: مشغل بودكاست أنيق يجعل من السهل تنزيل البودكاست وإدارة الاشتراك في البودكاست وتحويل البودكاست إلى نص.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: A elegant podcast player that make it easy to download podcast, manage podcast subscription, and transcribe podcast to text.
short.de: Einfacher Podcast-Player mit Textkonvertierung, Podcast-Verwaltung und Download-Funktion.
short.es: Un reproductor de podcasts que facilita la descarga, suscripción y transcripción de podcasts a texto.
short.fr: Un lecteur de podcast qui facilite le téléchargement, l'abonnement et la transcription des podcasts en texte.
short.he: נגן פודקאסטים אלגנטי המקל על הורדת פודקאסטים, ניהול מינויים לפודקאסטים והמרת פודקאסטים לטקסט.
short.hi: एक पॉडकास्ट प्लेयर जो पॉडकास्ट डाउनलोड करना, पॉडकास्ट सब्सक्राइब करना और पॉडकास्ट को टेक्स्ट में ट्रांसक्राइब करना आसान बनाता है।
short.id: Pemutar podcast yang memudahkan Anda untuk mengunduh, berlangganan, dan mentranskripsikan podcast ke teks.
short.it: Un lettore di podcast che semplifica il download, l'abbonamento e la trascrizione dei podcast in testo.
short.ja: シンプルで使いやすいポッドキャストプレーヤー。ポッドキャストをテキストに転写して、聴きながら読めるようにします。購読を管理し、プレイリストを作成し、ポッドキャストをダウンロードします。
short.ko: 간단하고 사용하기 쉬운 팟캐스트 플레이어입니다. 팟캐스트를 텍스트로 변환하여 보면서 들을 수 있습니다. 구독을 관리하고 재생 목록을 만들고 팟캐스트를 다운로드하는 데 도움을 줍니다.
short.pt_BR: Um player de podcast que facilita o download, a assinatura e a transcrição de podcasts para texto.
short.pt_PT: Um leitor de podcasts que simplifica o download, a gestão de subscrições e a transcrição para texto.
short.ru: Плеер для подкастов, который упрощает загрузку, подписку и транскрипцию подкастов в текст.
short.sv: En elegant poddspelare som gör det enkelt att ladda ner poddar, hantera prenumerationer och transkribera poddar till text.
short.th: เครื่องเล่นพอดแคสต์ที่ช่วยให้ดาวน์โหลด พอดแคสต์ สมัครสมาชิกพอดแคสต์ และแปลงพอดแคสต์เป็นข้อความได้ง่าย
short.tr: Podcast indirmeyi, podcast aboneliğini yönetmeyi ve podcast'i metne dökme işlemini kolaylaştıran zarif bir podcast oynatıcı.
short.vi: Trình phát podcast giúp bạn dễ dàng tải xuống, đăng ký và chuyển đổi podcast thành văn bản.
short.zh_CN: 一个简洁、易用的播客播放器。把播客转写成文字，边听边看。帮助您管理订阅，创建播放列表，下载播客。
short.zh_TW: 一個簡潔、易用的播客播放器。把播客轉寫成文字，邊聽邊看。幫助您管理訂閱，創建播放列表，下載播客。

long.ar:
💪 المميزات الرئيسية:

👉 تنزيل البودكاست مجانًا
✔️ تنزيل أحدث حلقة
✔️ تنزيل جميع الحلقات بنقرة واحدة

👉 إدارة اشتراكات البودكاست بسهولة
✔️ تتبع تحديثات البودكاست تلقائيًا
✔️ مزامنة الاشتراكات عبر الأجهزة

👉 إنشاء قائمة تشغيل خاصة بك
✔️ تشغيل الحلقات المُرتبة تلقائيًا واحدة تلو الأخرى

👉 نسخ البودكاست
✔️ تحويل البودكاست إلى نص مكتوب

👉 ملخص البودكاست بواسطة الذكاء الاصطناعي (يتطلب الوصول القسط)
✔️ تلخيص البودكاست باستخدام الذكاء الاصطناعي
✔️ اكتشاف المعرفة والكتب في البودكاست
✔️ نص الذكاء الاصطناعي

❓ الأسئلة المتكررة:

📌 هل يقرأ البودكاست معلومات من المواقع التي أزورها أو يعدلها؟
لا. نحن لا نقرأ بياناتك من أي موقع ويب، ولا نقوم بتعديلها.

📌 هل البودكاست مجاني؟
نعم. معظم ميزات البودكاست متاحة مجانًا. إذا كنت بحاجة إلى ميزات متعلقة بالذكاء الاصطناعي، يمكنك الاختيار من بين خطة البريميوم.


==================================
### Version: 2.14.0

Features:

- Migrate to Manifest V3
- Optimize podcasts update mechanism

==================================
### Version: 2.9.0

Features:

- Export/Import OPML File

==================================
### Version: 2.8.0

Features:

- Sort subscriptions by genre

==================================
### Version: 2.6.0

Features:

- Favorite episodes

==================================
### Version: 2.5.0

Features:

- Show episode info in control panel

==================================
### Version: 2.4.0

Features:

- Support volume control
- Show podcast's name in Queue/Inbox

==================================
### Version: 2.2.0

Features:

- Support skipping first / last settings for different podcasts
- Show episode info in full-screen mode
- Optimized episode description popup

==================================
### Version: 2.1.0

Features:

- Support bulk download episodes
- Optimize performance

==================================
### Version: 2.0.0

Features:

- Transcribe podcast to text
- Optimized Inbox loading performance
- Dark mode
- Fixed some bugs

==================================
### Version: 1.13

Features:

- Drag & Drop to reorder playing queue

Improvements:

- Fixed download failed, when episode name contains white space

==================================
### Version: 1.12

Improvements:

- Fixed download failed, when episode name contains white space
- Optimized episode searching
- Optimized episode synchronizing

==================================
### Version: 1.11

Features:

- Keep track of episodes you've listened to
- Show description of episodes
- Share episodes to Twitter/Facebook/Reddit/Weibo

==================================
### Version: 1.10

Features:

- Support searching podcasts from selected text in right click popup menu
- Support searching podcast by RSS feed URL

==================================
### Version: 1.9

Features:

- Play-control by keyboard
- Delete almost finished podcast, when switching to a new podcast
- New Inbox icon

Improvements:

- Improve performance when dragging playing progress bar

==================================
### Version: 1.8

New features:

- Smooth transition animation

Improvements:

- Optimized storage usage

==================================
### Version: 1.7.1

New features:

- Support search for episodes
- Support preview podcast meta-info

Improvements:

- Added extension to downloaded file name
- Better transition animation
- Better scrolling behaviors
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U:
💪 The Key Features:

👉 Download Podcasts for free
    ✔️ Download latest episode
    ✔️ Download all episode by one-click

👉  Manage your podcast subscriptions easily
    ✔️ Track podcast update automatically
    ✔️ Sync subscriptions across devices
    ✔️ Import subscriptions from OPML files

👉 Create your playlist
    ✔️ Queued episodes are played one by one

👉 Podcast transcription
    ✔️ Transcribe podcast to text

👉 AI podcast summary (premium access needed)
    ✔️ Summarize podcast using AI
    ✔️ Discover knowledge & books in podcast
    ✔️ AI transcript

❓ Frequently Asked Questions:

📌 Will podcasts read or modify information from websites I visit?
No. We do NOT read your data from any web site, nor do we modify it.

📌 Is Podcasts free?
Yes. Most of the features of Podcasts are available for free. If you require AI-related features, you can opt for the Premium Plan.


Privacy Policy: https://podcasts.bluepill.life/privacy.html

long.de:
💪 Hauptmerkmale:

👉 Podcasts kostenlos herunterladen
✔️ Neueste Folge herunterladen
✔️ Alle Episoden mit einem Klick herunterladen

👉 Verwalten Sie Ihre Podcast-Abonnements einfach
✔️ Podcast-Updates automatisch verfolgen
✔️ Abonnements auf verschiedenen Geräten synchronisieren

👉 Erstellen Sie Ihre Wiedergabeliste
✔️ Warteschlangenepisoden werden nacheinander abgespielt

👉 Podcast-Transkription
✔️ Podcasts in Text transkribieren

👉 KI-Podcast-Zusammenfassung (Premiumzugang erforderlich)
✔️ Podcasts mithilfe von KI zusammenfassen
✔️ Wissen und Bücher in Podcasts entdecken
✔️ KI-Transkript

❓ Häufig gestellte Fragen:

📌 Werden Podcasts Informationen von den von mir besuchten Websites lesen oder ändern?
Nein. Wir lesen keine Daten von Websites und wir ändern sie auch nicht.

📌 Sind Podcasts kostenlos?
Ja. Die meisten Funktionen von Podcasts sind kostenlos verfügbar. Wenn Sie jedoch KI-bezogene Funktionen benötigen, können Sie sich für das Premium-Abonnement entscheiden.

long.es:
💪 Características clave:

👉 Descarga podcasts de forma gratuita
✔️ Descarga el último episodio
✔️ Descarga todos los episodios con un solo clic

👉 Gestiona fácilmente tus suscripciones a podcasts
✔️ Realiza un seguimiento automático de las actualizaciones de podcasts
✔️ Sincroniza las suscripciones en todos tus dispositivos

👉 Crea tu lista de reproducción
✔️ Los episodios en cola se reproducen uno tras otro

👉 Transcripción de podcasts
✔️ Transcribe los podcasts a texto

👉 Resumen de podcasts con IA (requiere acceso premium)
✔️ Resume los podcasts utilizando IA
✔️ Descubre conocimientos y libros en los podcasts
✔️ Transcripción conIA

❓ Preguntas frecuentes:

📌 ¿Los podcasts leen o modifican la información de los sitios web que visito?
No. NO leemos tus datos de ningún sitio web ni los modificamos.

📌 ¿Los podcasts son gratuitos?
Sí. La mayoría de las funciones de los podcasts están disponibles de forma gratuita. Si necesitas funciones relacionadas con IA, puedes optar por el Plan Premium.

long.fr:
💪 Principales fonctionnalités :

👉 Télécharger des podcasts gratuitement
✔️ Télécharger le dernier épisode
✔️ Télécharger tous les épisodes en un clic

👉 Gérer facilement vos abonnements à des podcasts
✔️ Suivre automatiquement les mises à jour des podcasts
✔️ Synchroniser les abonnements sur tous les appareils

👉 Créer votre playlist
✔️ Les épisodes en attente sont lus un par un

👉 Transcription de podcast
✔️ Transcrire le podcast en texte

👉 Résumé de podcast par IA (accès premium requis)
✔️ Résumer le podcast en utilisant l'IA
✔️ Découvrir des connaissances et des livres dans les podcasts
✔️ Transcription par IA

❓ Questions fréquemment posées :

📌 Les podcasts lisent-ils ou modifient-ils les informations des sites web que je visite ?
Non. Nous NE lisons PAS vos données à partir de n'importe quel site web, et nous NE les modifions PAS.

📌 Les podcasts sont-ils gratuits ?
Oui. La plupart des fonctionnalités des podcasts sont disponibles gratuitement. Si vous avez besoin de fonctionnalités liées à l'IA, vous pouvez opter pour le plan Premium.

long.he:
💪 התכונות העיקריות:

👉 הורדת פודקאסטים בחינם
✔️ הורדת הפרק האחרון
✔️ הורדת כל הפרקים בלחיצה אחת

👉 ניהול מנויי הפודקאסטים שלך בצורה קלה
✔️ מעקב אוטומטי אחר עדכוני הפודקאסטים
✔️ סנכרון מנויים בין מכשירים

👉 יצירת רשימת השמעה אישית
✔️ פרקים בתור נשמעים אחד אחרי השני

👉 תעתיק הפודקאסט
✔️ תעתיק הפודקאסט לטקסט

👉 סיכום פודקאסט באמצעות הבנת מלאכותית (נדרש גישה פרימיום)
✔️ סיכום הפודקאסט באמצעות הבנת מלאכותית
✔️ גילוי ידע וספרים בפודקאסט
✔️ תעתיק מלאכותי

❓ שאלות נפוצות:

📌 האם פודקאסטים יכולים לקרוא או לשנות מידע מאתרים שאני מבקר בהם?
לא. אנחנו לא קוראים את הנתונים שלך מאתר אינטרנט כלשהו ואנחנו לא משנים אותם.

📌 האם פודקאסטים הם בחינם?
כן. רוב התכונות של הפודקאסטים זמינות בחינם. אם אתה זקוק לתכונות הקשורות לבינה מלאכותית, תוכל לבחור בתוכנית הפרימיום.
long.hi:
💪 मुख्य विशेषताएँ:

👉 पॉडकास्ट मुफ्त डाउनलोड करें
✔️ नवीनतम किस्सा डाउनलोड करें
✔️ सभी किस्से एक क्लिक में डाउनलोड करें

👉 पॉडकास्ट सदस्यता को आसानी से प्रबंधित करें
✔️ पॉडकास्ट अपडेट को स्वचालित रूप से ट्रैक करें
✔️ डिवाइसों के बीचHindi (continued):
सदस्यता सिंक करें

👉 अपनी प्लेलिस्ट बनाएं
✔️ कतारबद्ध किस्से एक-एक करके चलाए जाते हैं

👉 पॉडकास्ट ट्रांसक्रिप्शन
✔️ पॉडकास्ट को पाठ में ट्रांसक्राइब करें

👉 एआई पॉडकास्ट सारांश (प्रीमियम एक्सेस की आवश्यकता है)
✔️ एआई का उपयोग करके पॉडकास्ट को सारांशित करें
✔️ पॉडकास्ट में ज्ञान और किताबें खोजें
✔️ एआई ट्रांसक्रिप्ट

❓ अक्सर पूछे जाने वाले प्रश्न:

📌 क्या पॉडकास्ट वेबसाइटों से जानकारी पढ़ेंगे या संशोधित करेंगे जिन पर मैं जाता हूँ?
नहीं। हम किसी भी वेबसाइट से आपका डेटा नहीं पढ़ते हैं, और न ही उसे संशोधित करते हैं।

📌 क्या पॉडकास्ट मुफ्त है?
हाँ। पॉडकास्ट की अधिकांश सुविधाएँ मुफ्त में उपलब्ध हैं। यदि आपको एआई संबंधित सुविधाएँ चाहिए, तो आप प्रीमियम प्लान का चयन कर सकते हैं।
long.id:
💪 Fitur Utama:

👉 Unduh Podcast secara gratis
✔️ Unduh episode terbaru
✔️ Unduh semua episode dengan satu kali klik

👉 Kelola langganan podcast Anda dengan mudah
✔️ Lacak pembaruan podcast secara otomatis
✔️ Sinkronkan langganan di berbagai perangkat

👉 Buat daftar putar Anda sendiri
✔️ Episode yang masuk dalam daftar putar diputar satu per satu

👉 Transkripsi podcast
✔️ Transkripsi podcast menjadi teks

👉 Ringkasan podcast AI (membutuhkan akses premium)
✔️ Ringkas podcast menggunakan AI
✔️ Temukan pengetahuan & buku dalam podcast
✔️ Transkrip AI

❓ Pertanyaan yang Sering Diajukan:

📌 Apakah podcast membaca atau mengubah informasi dari situs web yang saya kunjungi?
Tidak. Kami TIDAK membaca data Anda dari situs web mana pun, dan kami TIDAK mengubahnya.

📌 Apakah Podcasts gratis?
Ya. Sebagian besar fitur Podcasts tersedia secara gratis. Jika Anda memerlukan fitur terkait AI, Anda dapat memilih Paket Premium.
long.it:
💪 Le Caratteristiche Chiave:

👉 Scarica i Podcast gratuitamente
✔️ Scarica l'ultimo episodio
✔️ Scarica tutti gli episodi con un clic

👉 Gestisci facilmente le tue sottoscrizioni ai podcast
✔️ Tieni traccia automaticamente degli aggiornamenti dei podcast
✔️ Sincronizza le sottoscrizioni tra dispositivi

👉 Crea la tua playlist
✔️ Gli episodi in coda vengono riprodotti uno dopo l'altro

👉 Trascrizione dei podcast
✔️ Trascrivi il podcast in testo

👉 Riassunto del podcast tramite intelligenza artificiale (accesso premium necessario)
✔️ Riassumi il podcast utilizzando l'intelligenza artificiale
✔️ Scopri conoscenze e libri nel podcast
✔️ Trascrizione tramite intelligenza artificiale

❓ Domande Frequenti:

📌 I podcast leggeranno o modificheranno le informazioni dai siti web che visito?
No. Noi NON leggiamo i tuoi dati da nessun sito web, né li modifichiamo.

📌 I Podcast sono gratuiti?
Sì. La maggior parte delle funzionalità dei Podcast è disponibile gratuitamente. Se hai bisogno di funzionalità legate all'intelligenza artificiale, puoi optare per il Piano Premium.


==================================
### Version: 2.5.0

Features:

- Show episode info in control panel

==================================
### Version: 2.4.0

Features:

- Support volume control
- Show podcast's name in Queue/Inbox

==================================
### Version: 2.2.0

Features:

- Support skipping first / last settings for different podcasts
- Show episode info in full-screen mode

==================================
### Version: 2.1.0

Features:

- Support bulk download episodes
- Optimize performance

==================================
### Version: 2.0.0

Features:

- Transcribe podcast to text
- Optimized Inbox loading performance
- Fixed some bugs

==================================
### Version: 1.13

Features:

- Drag & Drop to reorder playing queue

Improvements:

- Fixed download failed, when episode name contains white space

==================================
### Version: 1.12

Improvements:

- Fixed download failed, when episode name contains white space
- Optimized episode searching
- Optimized episode synchronizing

==================================
### Version: 1.11

Features:

- Keep track of episodes you've listened to
- Show description of episodes
- Share episodes to Twitter/Facebook/Reddit/Weibo

==================================
### Version: 1.10

Features:

- Support searching podcasts from selected text in right click popup menu
- Support searching podcast by RSS feed URL

==================================
### Version: 1.9

Features:

- Play-control by keyboard
- Delete almost finished podcast, when switching to a new podcast
- New Inbox icon

Improvements:

- Improve performance when dragging playing progress bar

==================================
### Version: 1.8

New features:

- Smooth transition animation

Improvements:

- Optimized storage usage

==================================
### Version: 1.7.1

New features:

- Support search for episodes
- Support preview podcast meta-info

Improvements:

- Added extension to downloaded file name
- Better transition animation
- Better scrolling behaviors
long.ja:
💪 主な特徴：

👉 無料でポッドキャストをダウンロード
✔️ 最新エピソードをダウンロード
✔️ ワンクリックで全てのエピソードをダウンロード

👉 ポッドキャストの購読を簡単に管理
✔️ ポッドキャストの更新を自動的に追跡
✔️ 購読をデバイス間で同期

👉 プレイリストの作成
✔️ キューに入ったエピソードは一つずつ再生されます

👉 ポッドキャストの転写
✔️ ポッドキャストをテキストに転写

👉 AIによるポッドキャストの要約（プレミアムアクセスが必要）
✔️ AIを使ってポッドキャストを要約
✔️ ポッドキャストで知識や本を発見
✔️ AIによる転写

❓ よくある質問：

📌 ポッドキャストは私が訪れたウェブサイトの情報を読み取ったり変更したりしますか？
いいえ。私たちはどのウェブサイトからもデータを読み取ることはなく、変更することもありません。

📌 ポッドキャストは無料ですか？
はい。ポッドキャストのほとんどの機能は無料で利用できます。ただし、AI関連の機能が必要な場合は、プレミアムプランを選択することができます。

long.ko:
💪 주요 기능:

👉 무료로 팟캐스트 다운로드
✔️ 최신 에피소드 다운로드
✔️ 한 번에 모든 에피소드 다운로드

👉 팟캐스트 구독 관리 쉽게
✔️ 자동으로 팟캐스트 업데이트 추적
✔️ 기기 간 구독 동기화

👉 재생 목록 생성
✔️ 대기열에 있는 에피소드 순차 재생

👉 팟캐스트 전사
✔️ 팟캐스트를 텍스트로 전사

👉 인공지능 팟캐스트 요약 (프리미엄 액세스 필요)
✔️ 인공지능을 사용하여 팟캐스트 요약
✔️ 팟캐스트에서 지식과 책 발견
✔️ 인공지능 전사

❓ 자주 묻는 질문:

📌 팟캐스트가 방문한 웹사이트의 정보를 읽거나 수정하나요?
아니요. 우리는 어떤 웹사이트에서도 데이터를 읽지 않고 수정하지 않습니다.

📌 팟캐스트는 무료인가요?
네. 대부분의 팟캐스트 기능은 무료로 제공됩니다. 만약 인공지능 관련 기능이 필요하다면 프리미엄 플랜을 선택할 수 있습니다.

💪 Principais Recursos:

👉 Baixe Podcasts gratuitamente
✔️ Baixe o episódio mais recente
✔️ Baixe todos os episódios com um clique

✔️ Sincronize as assinaturas entre dispositivos

👉 Crie sua lista de reprodução
✔️ Os episódios na fila são reproduzidos um por um

✔️ Transcreva o podcast para texto

✔️ Resuma o podcast usando IA

✔️ Transcrição com IA

Não. Nós não lemos seus dados de nenhum site, nem os modificamos.

Sim. A maioria dos recursos dos Podcasts está disponível gratuitamente. Se você precisar de recursos relacionados à IA, pode optar pelo Plano Premium.

💪 Основные функции:

👉 Загрузка подкастов бесплатно
✔️ Загрузка последней серии
✔️ Загрузка всех серий одним кликом

👉 Удобное управление подписками на подкасты
✔️ Автоматическое отслеживание обновлений подкастов
✔️ Синхронизация подписок между устройствами

👉 Создание собственного плейлиста
✔️ Очередь воспроизведения серий по порядку

👉 Транскрипция подкастов
✔️ Транскрипция подкаста в текст

👉 Автоматическое краткое содержание подкастов с использованием искусственного интеллекта (требуется премиум-доступ)
✔️ Краткое содержание подкаста с использованием искусственного интеллекта
✔️ Поиск знаний и книг в подкасте
✔️ Транскрипт с использованием искусственного интеллекта

❓ Часто задаваемые вопросы:

📌 Будут ли подкасты читать или изменять информацию с веб-сайтов, которые я посещаю?
Нет. Мы НЕ читаем ваши данные с любого веб-сайта и не изменяем их.

📌 Подкасты бесплатные?
Да. Большинство функций подкастов доступны бесплатно. Если вам нужны функции, связанные с искусственным интеллектом, вы можете выбрать Премиум-план.

long.sv:
💪 Nyckelfunktioner:

👉 Ladda ner podcasts gratis
✔️ Ladda ner senaste avsnittet
✔️ Ladda ner alla avsnitt med ett klick

👉 Hantera dina podcasts-prenumerationer enkelt
✔️ Spåra podcast-uppdateringar automatiskt
✔️ Synka prenumerationer mellan enheter

👉 Skapa din spellista
✔️ Kön av avsnitt spelas upp i tur och ordning

👉 Transkribering av podcasts
✔️ Transkribera podcasts till text

👉 AI-poddsummering (kräver premiumåtkomst)
✔️ Summera podcasts med hjälp av AI
✔️ Upptäck kunskap och böcker i podcasts
✔️ AI-transkription

❓ Vanliga frågor:

📌 Kommer podcasts att läsa eller ändra information från webbplatser jag besöker?
Nej. Vi läser INTE dina data från någon webbplats, och vi ändrar dem inte heller.

📌 Är podcasts gratis?
Ja. De flesta funktionerna i podcasts är gratis. Om du behöver funktioner relaterade till AI kan du välja Premium-planen.
long.th:
💪 คุณสมบัติหลัก:

👉 ดาวน์โหลด Podcast ฟรี
✔️ ดาวน์โหลดตอนล่าสุด
✔️ ดาวน์โหลดตอนทั้งหมดด้วยคลิกเดียว

👉 จัดการการสมัครสมาชิก Podcast ได้อย่างง่ายดาย
✔️ ติดตามการอัปเดต Podcast อัตโนมัติ
✔️ ซิงค์การสมัครสมาชิกในอุปกรณ์ต่าง ๆ

👉 สร้างรายการเพลย์ลิสต์ของคุณ
✔️ ตอนที่อยู่ในคิวจะถูกเล่นต่อเนื่อง

👉 การแปลงเสียง Podcast
✔️ แปลงเสียง Podcast เป็นข้อความ

👉 สรุป Podcast ด้วย AI (ต้องมีการเข้าถึงระดับพรีเมียม)
✔️ สรุป Podcast โดยใช้ AI
✔️ ค้นพบความรู้และหนังสือใน Podcast
✔️ การเขียนตัวอักษรโดยใช้ AI

❓ คำถามที่พบบ่อย:

📌 Podcast จะอ่านหรือแก้ไขข้อมูลจากเว็บไซต์ที่ฉันเข้าชมหรือไม่?
ไม่, เรา ไม่ อ่านข้อมูลจากเว็บไซต์ใด ๆ ที่คุณเข้าชมและไม่ได้แก้ไขข้อมูลดังกล่าว

📌 Podcast เป็นฟรีหรือไม่?
ใช่, ส่วนใหญ่คุณสมบัติของ Podcast เป็นฟรี หากคุณต้องการคุณสมบัติที่เกี่ยวข้องกับ AI คุณสามารถเลือกใช้แผน Premium ได้

👉 Podcast'leri ücretsiz indirin
✔️ En son bölümü indirin
✔️ Tüm bölümleri tek tıklamayla indirin

👉 Podcast aboneliklerinizi kolayca yönetin
✔️ Podcast güncellemelerini otomatik olarak takip edin
✔️ Abonelikleri cihazlar arasında senkronize edin

👉 Kendi çalma listesi oluşturun
✔️ Sıraya alınan bölümler sırayla oynatılır

👉 Podcast transkripti
✔️ Podcast'i metne transkript edin

👉 Yapay Zeka destekli podcast özeti (premium erişim gereklidir)
✔️ Yapay Zeka kullanarak podcast'i özetleyin
✔️ Podcast'te bilgi ve kitap keşfedin
✔️ Yapay Zeka transkripti

❓ Sıkça Sorulan Sorular:

📌 Podcast'ler, ziyaret ettiğim web sitelerinden bilgi okur veya değiştirir mi?
Hayır. Herhangi bir web sitesinden verilerinizi okumuyoruz ve değiştirmiyoruz.

📌 Podcast'ler ücretsiz mi?
Evet. Podcast'lerin çoğu özelliği ücretsiz olarak sunulılır. AI ile ilgili özelliklere ihtiyaç duyarsanız, Premium Plan'ı tercih edebilirsiniz.
long.vi:
💪 Các Tính Năng Chính:

👉 Tải xuống Podcast miễn phí
✔️ Tải xuống tập mới nhất
✔️ Tải xuống tất cả các tập bằng một cú nhấp chuột

👉 Quản lý đơn giản các đăng ký Podcast
✔️ Theo dõi cập nhật Podcast tự động
✔️ Đồng bộ đăng ký trên các thiết bị

👉 Tạo danh sách phát riêng của bạn
✔️ Các tập đã được xếp hàng sẽ được phát một cách tuần tự

👉 Chuyển đổi Podcast thành văn bản
✔️ Chuyển đổi Podcast thành văn bản

👉 Tóm tắt Podcast bằng trí tuệ nhân tạo (yêu cầu truy cập Premium)
✔️ Tóm tắt Podcast bằng trí tuệ nhân tạo
✔️ Khám phá kiến thức và sách trong Podcast
✔️ Bản ghi âm bằng trí tuệ nhân tạo

❓ Câu hỏi Thường gặp:

📌 Podcast có đọc hoặc sửa thông tin từ các trang web tôi truy cập không?
Không. Chúng tôi không đọc dữ liệu của bạn từ bất kỳ trang web nào và cũng không sửa đổi nó.

📌 Podcast miễn phí phải không?
Có. Hầu hết các tính năng của Podcast đều miễn phí. Nếu bạn cần các tính năng liên quan đến trí tuệ nhân tạo, bạn có thể chọn Gói Premium.


==================================
### Version: 2.14.0

Features:

- Migrate to Manifest V3
- Optimize podcasts update mechanism

==================================
### Version: 2.9.0

Features:

- Export/Import OPML File

==================================
### Version: 2.8.0

Features:

- Sort subscriptions by genre

==================================
### Version: 2.6.0

Features:

- Favorite episodes

==================================
### Version: 2.5.0

Features:

- Show episode info in control panel

==================================
### Version: 2.5.0

Features:

- Show episode info in control panel

==================================
### Version: 2.4.0

Features:

- Support volume control
- Show podcast's name in Queue/Inbox

==================================
### Version: 2.2.0

Features:

- Support skipping first / last settings for different podcasts
- Show episode info in full-screen mode
- Optimized episode description popup

==================================
### Version: 2.1.0

Features:

- Support bulk download episodes
- Optimize performance

==================================
### Version: 2.0.0

Features:

- Transcribe podcast to text
- Optimized Inbox loading performance
- Dark mode
- Fixed some bugs

==================================
### Version: 1.13

Features:

- Drag & Drop to reorder playing queue

Improvements:

- Fixed download failed, when episode name contains white space

==================================
### Version: 1.12

Improvements:

- Fixed download failed, when episode name contains white space
- Optimized episode searching
- Optimized episode synchronizing

==================================
### Version: 1.11

Features:

- Keep track of episodes you've listened to
- Show description of episodes
- Share episodes to Twitter/Facebook/Reddit/Weibo

==================================
### Version: 1.10

Features:

- Support searching podcasts from selected text in right click popup menu
- Support searching podcast by RSS feed URL

==================================
### Version: 1.9

Features:

- Play-control by keyboard
- Delete almost finished podcast, when switching to a new podcast
- New Inbox icon

Improvements:

- Improve performance when dragging playing progress bar

==================================
### Version: 1.8

New features:

- Smooth transition animation

Improvements:

- Optimized storage usage

==================================
### Version: 1.7.1

New features:

- Support search for episodes
- Support preview podcast meta-info

Improvements:

- Added extension to downloaded file name
- Better transition animation
- Better scrolling behaviors
long.zh_CN:
💪 主要功能：

👉 免费下载播客
✔️ 下载最新集数
✔️ 一键下载全部集数

👉 轻松管理播客订阅
✔️ 自动追踪播客更新
✔️ 在设备间同步订阅

👉 创建播放列表
✔️ 按顺序播放排队的集数

👉 播客转录
✔️ 将播客转录为文字

👉 AI 播客摘要（需要高级访问权限）
✔️ 使用人工智能摘要播客
✔️ 在播客中发现知识和书籍
✔️ AI 转录

❓ 常见问题：

📌 播客会读取或修改我访问的网站信息吗？
不会。我们不会读取您从任何网站获取的数据，也不会对其进行修改。

📌 播客是免费的吗？
是的。大部分播客功能都可以免费使用。如果您需要使用与人工智能相关的功能，可以选择高级计划。

long.zh_TW:
💪 主要功能：

👉 免費下載播客
    ✔️ 下載最新集數
    ✔️ 一鍵下載全部集數

👉 輕鬆管理播客訂閱
    ✔️ 自動追蹤播客更新
    ✔️ 在不同設備間同步訂閱

👉 創建播放清單
    ✔️ 依序播放預排集數

👉 播客轉錄
    ✔️ 將播客轉錄為文字

👉 AI 播客摘要（需付費訂閱）
    ✔️ 使用人工智慧摘要播客內容 
    ✔️ 在播客中發掘知識和書籍
    ✔️ AI 文字轉錄

❓ 常見問題：

📌 播客是否會讀取或修改我訪問的網站信息？
不會。我們不會從任何網站讀取您的數據，也不會對其進行修改。

📌 播客是否免費？
是的。播客的大部分功能都是免費的。如果您需要 AI 相關的功能，可以選擇付費訂閱計劃。"

不會。我們不會從任何網站讀取您的數據，也不會對其進行修改。
